pullrequest.title: Load GUI Plugins with gzclient parameter -g, fixes issue 1311

content.raw:
I was testing the plugins with this PR an seems to be working fine for me.

With respect to have an extra check, if the check is not expensive in performance, I'm for leaving it there, the code will evolve with time and it can serve as a firewall in the future.
content.html:
I was testing the plugins with this PR an seems to be working fine for me.

With respect to have an extra check, if the check is not expensive in performance, I'm for leaving it there, the code will evolve with time and it can serve as a firewall in the future.
